title: nioctib_100
author: nioctib_100
content: I wish I could be notified when one of my past messages was quoted and directly responded to. Call it conceited, but I get a good dose of dopamine when someone responds directly to me vs. just responding to someone else in the thread, and I search through all "new replies" (often to no avail   ) to see if anyone has responded directly to my posts. I know this was requested a few years ago, but it seems like a relatively easy fix.Proposed Solution: In the "New Replies" section, show directly quoted threads at the top, also denoted by either bold or a special icon.

comments.body: Quote from: nioctib_100 on February 28, 2023, 02:43:24 AMI wish I could be notified when one of my past messages was quoted and directly responded to.Since you created this thread in the "New forum software" sub-board, it's worth mentioning that "Epochtalk already has a notification system" for such things.Quote from: nioctib_100 on February 28, 2023, 02:43:24 AMand I search through all "new replies" (often to no avail   ) to see if anyone has responded directly to my posts.In addition to the above suggestions, as a workaround, you can click the magnifier icon from the upper right corner of the page, then type your name in the "search for" field and choose the period in the "message age" fields.
